UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile on Campus Cart.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

avatarId.description: Reference to Avatar. (Relationship: Avatar 1:1 UserProfile).  This is used if the user chooses a pre-designed avatar.

bio.description: A short biography or description of the user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

location.description: The user's general location, e.g., 'Main Campus'.

contactNumber.description: The user's phone number for contact.

Item.title: Item
Item.description: Represents an item listed for sale on Campus Cart.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Item entity.

sellerId.description: Reference to UserProfile of the seller. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N Item)

condition.description: Condition of the item (e.g., new, used, like new).

postedDate.description: Date and time when the item was posted.

contactNumber.description: Seller's contact number for this item.

facebookProfileUrl.description: Seller's Facebook profile URL for this item.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a category of items on Campus Cart.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Category entity.

name.description: Name of the category (e.g., Gadgets, Books, Clothes).

Avatar.title: Avatar
Avatar.description: Represents a pre-designed avatar that users can choose for their profile picture.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Avatar entity.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. Path-based ownership ensures only the user can read/write their profile.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique ID of the user.

definition.description: Stores items for sale. Includes denormalized 'sellerId' for authorization independence.

params.name: itemId
params.description: The unique ID of the item.

params.name: categoryId
params.description: The unique ID of the category.

params.name: avatarId
params.description: The unique ID of the avatar.

firestore.reasoning:
The Firestore structure is designed to ensure authorization independence, clarity, and scalability for the Campus Cart application. User profiles are stored under `/users/{userId}` using path-based ownership. Items are stored under `/items/{itemId}` and include the `sellerId` to easily identify the seller. Categories are stored in a top-level `/categories` collection. Avatars are stored under `/avatars/{avatarId}`.

**Authorization Independence**: The `Item` document denormalizes the `sellerId`, which allows rules to determine ownership of an item directly from the item document without needing to read the user's profile. 

**QAPs (Rules are not Filters)**: Items are stored in a top-level `/items` collection. Queries can efficiently filter and list items without requiring complex security rules. Profile data is kept private under each user's document. The separation of concerns ensures that listing and filtering operations are secure and efficient.
